data.rationale: CALI storage (.git-ml/cali/logs/ and .git-ml/cali/objects/) contains irreplaceable chat transcripts and action logs. The gitignore incorrectly marks them as 'regeneratable'. Only .git-ml/cali/local/ should be ignored as it contains indices that CAN be rebuilt.
data.title: Fix ML data loss by unignoring CALI logs and objects directories
